name: Week 7, Lennox (Project Movement)
description:
Project Movement, otherwise known as "Rooftop Runner" is a 2D platformer which blends elements from the fast-paced 2D Sonic Games and the explore-heavy Metroidvania genre. This is only a beginning level, I hope you like it!

* Features a save-game function, so you won't lose your currency or in-game upgrades.
